slogan2: Palm Rent is a leading car rental company.
reasonDescription1: There are many reasons to rent a car in Dubai. Business professionals often rent a car, such as a sleek motorbike, to impress clients and convey a sense of wealth and success. Many tourists rent a car to experience the luxury lifestyle of Dubai. But our list doesn’t just include high-end supercars like Ferraris and Lamborghinis. We also offer a diverse range of SUVs and economy cars that are perfect for exploring all that Dubai has to offer. Best Car Rental Companies
reasonDescription2: Renty’s integrated service offers customers exceptional choice and the best value in the industry. All cars listed on Renty are fully vetted and of the highest quality. We implement strict quality control procedures. And we only work with dealerships that guarantee excellent service and great value. Drivers can be assured of the highest standards when renting a car on Renty. Our platform provides you with a simple and straightforward car rental process. If you want to rent a luxury car,
reasonDescription3: Palm Rent is a leading online car rental service specializing in luxury cars, economy cars, commercial vehicles and vans. We cater to both casual tourists and business professionals looking for a fully tested luxury car rental in Dubai and the UAE. Our platform offers a comprehensive selection of premium cars from all the major service providers in Dubai, Abu Dhabi, Sharjah and Ras Al Khaimah.

AboutPalmRent: About Palm Rent Car Rental Company
dubaiDescription: The Palm Rent office in Dubai is one of the most active car rental centers in the UAE, offering services such as no deposit, unlimited mileage, free insurance, and 24/7 support, providing a completely hassle-free experience for travelers and residents.
turkeyDescription: We also provide our services extensively in Istanbul, Turkey. With no need for a deposit or any collateral, and no mileage restrictions, all you need to do is pay the rental fee. The cars include economy, family, and SUVs, and are offered with Persian-speaking support.
omanDescription: In Muscat, Oman, Palm Rent is ready to provide the latest cars. With the possibility of delivery at the airport, quick online reservations, free basic insurance, and phone support, your trip to Oman will be easy and enjoyable.
tehranBranchAddress: Sayad Shirazi Highway, Hosseinabad Square, next to Mellat Bank. Palm Rent Content Production Office
ahwazBranchAddress: Enghelab Street, next to Sepah Bank, Jumbo Store, 4th floor, Unit 3
dubaiBranchAddress: Airport Road, Palm Rent Building, 1st floor, near Dubai International Airport
palmRentInstaSub: Follow us on Instagram. Over 200,000 followers have trusted us.
ruleQ7: Car Rental Rules and Regulations in Dubai
ruleA1: Palm Rent is a car rental company with branches and official representatives in most cities around the world. With a highly advanced website and fully online reservations, it guarantees the best price with just a few clicks and offers the widest variety of new and latest model cars. Additionally, customers can use the company's services without needing a credit card and by paying in rials.
ruleA3: Fuel costs are the responsibility of the customer. Please ensure that the car is returned with the same amount of fuel as when it was delivered. Otherwise, if the car is returned with less fuel than it had at delivery, you will be charged for the fuel. However, if you return the car with extra fuel, no payment will be made to you.
ruleA4: To extend your reservation, contact the Palm Rent support team at least two days before the end of the rental period. Note that extending the reservation depends on availability and vehicle capacity, so this option may not be available.
ruleA5: The customer is responsible for paying parking fees. Even if the car is delivered for free, any parking fees, including airport parking at the time of car delivery, must be paid by the customer.
ruleA6: Paying the deposit on the website is considered a final reservation, and in case of cancellation, the paid amount is non-refundable. Note that there is no need to pay a deposit initially to make a reservation.
ruleA7:
Age requirements: The driver must be at least 19 years old and have held a driving license for at least one year.
International driving license: Iranian citizens must have a valid international driving license to rent a car in Dubai. Only the person who rents the car is allowed to drive. If a second or third driver is needed, their international driving license information must be registered, and there will be an additional fee. Requesting a child seat also incurs an additional fee.
Car insurance: All cars are delivered with full insurance.

commonA1:
The price of fuel in Dubai as of January 2024:
E-Plus (Octane 97) 2.77 dirhams,
Special (Octane 95) 2.85 dirhams (recommended)
Super (Octane 98) 2.96 dirhams
Diesel 3.19 dirhams.
commonA2: Driving without a license in car rental is illegal and may result in fines or even imprisonment. Additionally, in the event of an accident, insurance will not cover the damage costs. It is important to comply with the laws to avoid legal and financial problems.
commonA3: Typically, at the airport, you may be given a free SIM card with 2 GB of internet. But if this is not available, you can purchase a SIM card from Etisalat booths located all over Dubai. For a 7-day internet package, the approximate cost is between 70 to 100 dirhams. It is highly recommended to get a SIM card, as internet access is essential for services like Google Maps and finding routes.
commonA4:
In Dubai, parking in public areas usually requires payment, and the parking system is very organized and digital. You can pay for parking in two simple ways:
Via SMS: Send the plate number, zone number, and parking duration to the RTA system and receive a confirmation message.
Via street parking machines: Pay with a bank card or coins and receive a receipt.
You can also use the RTA Dubai and Dubai Drive apps for payment, extension, and finding parking spots. Be aware that parking in prohibited or double-parked areas may result in fines.
commonA5: Picking up the car at Dubai Airport not only allows you to receive your car quickly and conveniently but also offers significant financial benefits. If you rent the car to your hotel destination, you will incur at least 150 dirhams in costs. By picking up the car at the airport, you do not need to pay for a taxi and can directly use the rental car to reach your destination. We strongly recommend picking up the car at the airport to take advantage of these benefits.
commonA6: By visiting one of the Automobile Association offices and presenting your original passport, a photo, and your driving license, you can obtain an international driving license in less than 15 minutes by paying approximately 200,000 tomans.
commonA7:
Renting a car in Dubai is considered a cost-saving option because, for the price of a single taxi ride, you can rent a reasonably priced car from Palm Rent. This cost reduction allows you to move around the beautiful city of Dubai economically and independently, without worrying about repeated taxi expenses.
With a rental car, you can optimize your travel time and go on your desired trips without needing to repeatedly pay for taxis. As a result, renting a car allows you to move around Dubai more independently, economically, and flexibly.
commonA8:
Image of international driving license
Image of passport
commonA9:
The deposit amount (deposit) related to possible violations is as follows:
- 1000 dirhams for economy cars
- 1500 dirhams for medium cars
- 2000 dirhams for luxury cars
- 5000 dirhams for super luxury cars
(Deposit amounts are listed under all cars)
These amounts can also be paid in rials. If no violations or debts occur, these amounts will be refunded to the renter's account within a maximum of 20 working days after returning the car to the company.
If you wish to pay the deposit in dirhams, pay 2 million tomans for the car reservation through the website, and the deposit amount will be received in cash upon car delivery. (The reservation amount will be refunded to the applicant's account after receiving the car)
If you pay the deposit in rials, the rial deposit amount will be slightly higher than the dirham equivalent due to currency fluctuations, and in case of fines, it will be deducted from the rial amount according to the daily rate and fees.
If you reserve a car and do not pick it up, the equivalent of 2 days' rental fee will be charged.
commonA10: Individuals who rent a car from Palm Rent and, after paying the deposit and completing the reservation, cancel one day, the amount for canceling that day will be deducted from the paid amount.
commonA11: In Dubai, the transfer cost to various destinations, including the airport, hotel, or any other location, is 50 dirhams for each one-way trip and 50 dirhams for the return. However, in Sharjah, the cost for each round trip is 200 dirhams.
commonA12: Regarding car rental in Istanbul, the price is determined based on the type of rental car and whether it is daily or monthly.
